q1: Who did you expect to be in the final for the 2018 World Cup?
a1: Would you ever span this hit even though you are not allowed to?
q2: Is football increasing in popularity globally?
a2: I think so. The world cup seemed bigger than ever this year.
q3: Do you think it will become bigger in the US?
a3: maybe it will! I usually see it big in brazil!
q4: It might take a while but getting recognized with the influx of retiring stars moving to MLS
a4: What does spanning a hit mean?
q5: Spanning a hit is a term often used if the player is scoping out the field to look for an opening.
